summary: AC CONDENSER 2015 YUKON DENALI BROKEN FOR MONTHS, TOLD REPEATEDLY FROM PRIME DEALERSHIP THAT NO CONDENSERS AVAILABLE, THERE IS A 40+ PERSON WAIT FOR NEW CONDENSERS WITHIN A 10 MILE RADIUS. IT'S A FULL TIME JOB TO GET SOMEONE TO HELP US. WE BOUGHT THIS CAR 1 YEAR AGO AND CAN'T EVEN DRIVE IT IN THIS HOT WEATHER! SITS IN OUR DRIVEWAY UNTIL THE TEMP GETS TO BELOW 80.
